item.title: AKTUAL
item.description: ASH KOOSHA show in TheWaveVR Event in TheWaveVR 8.16.17 Trailer Fan Video LiveStream I worked on some shaders, particles systems, animation, and art direction with strangeloop studios and aaron lemke Basically, took these dope videos by Hirad Sab (in the form of blender files) and made similar effects run realtime in Unity Press Techcrunch FACTMag VRFocus [Jump Into The Light](https://jumpintothelight.com/2017/08/16/experience-the-fourth-flagship-wave-aktual-featuring-ash-koosha-and-the-wav e-vr/) VRREporter

item.title: 3D Web Fest
item.description: Live performance at 3D web fest Music by Alon Mor This fractal visualization explores the relationship between chaos and rules. Given simple objects and processes, iteration yields an unprecedented network of connections and complexity. All parameters controls can be changed on the fly, with 3D controls. This is a fundamental property of all organisms around us. Simple cells follow iterative processes, generating the richness in forms of the natural world. This work illustrates these connections with a powerful 3D fractal renderer capable of visualizing complex networks from tree structures to immersive surreal landscapes.

item.title: capyac
item.description: Live performance of Audio-Reactive Shaders VJ for CAPYAC in 2015 I was lucky enough to meet the talented folks at CAPYAC and become a part of their live show. I use many types of software like VDMX, WebGL and Magic Music Visuals to run custom GLSL shaders and ISF. By hooking a direct audio feed from the stage mixer into the shaders I can get some really responsive audio reactive stuff going on.
